name: WrongTurn
description:
WrongTurn is a team project created to showcase at EGLX 2018 and received great response from visitors regarding the overall game design and atmosphere.

Its a Horror Puzzle game with inspiration from P.T. and Slenderman.

Highlights:

  1. Shaders to simulate static on screen
  2. Customs GUI's to display text and keypad
  3. Custom VO's
  4. Interesting story-line
